alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Flagler, eastern Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 115 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Delancy to 9 miles southwest of Santos. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Salt Springs, Andalusia, Juniper Springs, Lynne, Lake Delancy, Weirsdale and The Village of Briar Meadow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Marion; Western Putnam
